item.title: I’m leaving the bulk of my estate to my youngest son as he is my only child with grandchildren. Do I need a will?
item.description: “I have Vanguard stocks valued at about $350,000 and two savings accounts, each of which has $100,000.”

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.
